data.title: Earn an AA or AAS Business & Logistics Degree
data.text:
Gain a big-picture understanding of business principles and hands-on experience at FRCC. Our Associate of Art (AA) and Associate of Applied Science (AAS) programs will help you transfer to a four-year university. Our certificate programs will give you more specialized tools to advance your career. And with flexible online and in-person class options, we make it easier than ever to get the skills you need to succeed.

Why Study Business & Logistics at Front Range Community College?

At FRCC, you'll learn proven business principles in small classroom settings. Our faculty are industry experts and have worked in business, bringing real-world experience to the classroom.

We offer three degrees that will help you earn your bachelor's degree, enter the workforce, or gain the skills you need to move up in your profession. We also offer five certificate programs you can complete in as little as one semester. You'll be sure to find the program that is right for you.

FRCC also provides flexibility and convenience for your class options. You can take classes online or in person at our three campus locations. In addition, you can earn many of our business degrees and certificates online. You'll be sure to find a program that fits your needs.

Transfer Options

If you're planning to complete your bachelor's degree in business, you can kickstart your education at FRCC. Our AA in business is guaranteed to transfer to all Colorado public 4-year universities. Our AAS programs will help you transfer to Regis University.

Transfer Your AA Degree

Your AA degree in business will transfer to the following four-year schools:

Adams State University

Colorado Mesa University

Colorado State University-Fort Collins

Colorado State University-Global Campus

Colorado State University-Pueblo

Fort Lewis College

Metropolitan State University of Denver

University of Colorado at Boulder

University of Colorado at Colorado Springs

University of Colorado Denver

University of Northern Colorado

Western State Colorado University

east Learn more about transferring

Transfer Your AAS to Regis University

FRCC is proud to have a transfer agreement with Regis University. If you graduate with an AAS in business or AAS in business logistics, you will be able to transfer all your credits to Regis University. You will be able to graduate from Regis University with a bachelor's degree in business administration.

east Learn about the Regis University Transfer Agreement
